name: atlas_create_atlas_cluster
description: Creates a new Atlas cluster in an existing Atlas project.

projectId.description: The ID of the Atlas project.

clusterName.description: The name of the cluster to create.

region.description: The cloud provider region to deploy the cluster in. eg. US_EAST_1

cloudProvider.description: The cloud provider (e.g., AWS, GCP, AZURE).

tier.description: The instance size (e.g., M0, M2, M5).

name: atlas_setup_atlas_network_access
description: Sets up network access for an existing Atlas project. Accepts list of IP addresses or CIDR blocks.

projectId.description: The ID of the Atlas project.

ipAddresses.description: An array of IP addresses or CIDR blocks for network access.

name: atlas_create_atlas_user
description: Creates a new database user for an existing Atlas project. User will have atlasAdmin role.

projectId.description: The ID of the Atlas project.

username.description: The username for the database user.

password.description: The password for the database user.

roles.description: An array of roles for the user. Default is [atlasAdmin].

name: atlas_get_atlas_connection_strings
description: Retrieves connection strings for a cluster in an existing Atlas project.

projectId.description: The ID of the Atlas project.

name: atlas_list_atlas_projects
description: Lists all Atlas projects that the API key has access to.

name: atlas_list_atlas_clusters
description: Lists all clusters in an Atlas project.

projectId.description: The ID of the Atlas project.
